mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gmair_data_analysis.co2_daily(status_id, machine_id, average_co2, max_co2, min_co2, block_flag, create_time) VALUES(#{statusId}, #{machineId}, #{averageCo2}, #{maxCo2}, #{minCo2}, #{blockFlag}, #{createAt})

INSERT INTO gmair_data_analysis.co2_daily(status_id, machine_id, average_co2, max_co2, min_co2, block_flag, create_time) VALUES
(#{Co2Daily.statusId}, #{Co2Daily.machineId}, #{Co2Daily.averageCo2}, #{Co2Daily.maxCo2}, #{Co2Daily.minCo2}, #{Co2Daily.blockFlag}, #{Co2Daily.createAt})
